title: Patch 6.11 is live!

embed.description: Greetings, summoners. Welcome to patch 6.11, the one where we clean out the balance closet. With the Midseason dust settling on live servers, we're turning our attention to professional play. That means taking a swipe at the picks that are stifling champion diversity.

body:
Patch 6.11 is now live in OCE. If you discover any issues or bugs after patching please post them here and we'll investigate.

Have a great day & see you on the rift!

Mindstar

replies.body: Well at least they nerfed Swain a bit. It's so irritating battling him.

Already posted this here  (http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/0Mga4LEE-zed-changes ) however, again the Zed part needs rewording as it sounds like it's decreasing the fall off through minions instead of the multiple shurikens.
Let me raise that and see if we can make it clearer.
